translation: I'm Xiaomao Wu, the founder of the GritWorld.
transcript: 我叫吴小毛，是粒界科技的创始人。

translation: You have just seen a lot of excellent works, including movies, games, and the animation.
transcript: 大家刚才看到了很多优秀的作品，就是有影视的，有游戏的，还有这个动漫的。

translation: Have you ever thought that the media we have used hasn't changed much in the past few decades, no matter through cell phones, TV screens, machine screens, film screens or dome screens?
transcript: 但是大家有没有想过，我们观看这种呃媒体的方式，在过去的几十年，它都没有什么太大的变化，一直是要不是手机，要不是电视机，电脑屏幕、荧幕以及球幕。

translation: I've been thinking for years about whether this way of viewing can be revolutionized or changed.
transcript: 那我思考了很多年这个问题，这种观看的方式能不能受到一定的革命，呃，能不能有一些变化。

translation: In order to find the answer to this question, I have founded the GritWorld.
transcript: 所以带着这个问题，我创办了粒界科技。

translation: I have been engaged in the technical work of games all the time.
transcript: 呃，我一直从事游戏的技术工作。

translation: In the process of making games, I find, as the game is of high quality, can this kind of technology be used for film and television?
transcript: 所以在做游戏过程中后来我会发现，游戏的品质这么高，那能不能用来做影视呢？

translation: Therefore, in the past eight years, I led the team to introduce the game technology to the film and television industry. It can be said that we have greatly revolutionized the way of making the animation and films.
transcript: 所以，呃，我就带团队在过去的八年的时间，把这个游戏的技术把它带到影视行业而且应该是来说颠覆了动漫和电影的制作方式。

translation: It's a very long process.
transcript: 然后在，呃，在做这个过程中，它是有一个非常漫长的一个过程。

translation: Technology can easily help update one industry, but it needs great efforts.
transcript: 所以技术对一个行业的更新讲起来是非常容易，但是它在做起来的时候，它是要付诸巨大的努力的。

translation: However, the shock and revolution it brings to the whole industry are also very impressive.
transcript: 但是它带来的这个震撼力以及对行业的这个革命性，也是非常非常的大的。

translation: For example, we can shorten the lengths of pictures in the movies from weeks to days, hours, twenty to thirty minutes to even tens of milliseconds or one millisecond.
transcript: 比如说我们可以把一大家看到的这些电影的画面，从几个星期到呃几天到几个小时或者最少也要二三十分钟，可以把它缩短到几十个毫秒，甚至一个毫秒。

translation: In the following, I will show you the video which has been made with this brand new technology.
transcript: 所以我接下来呃，给大家演示的这个视频就是用这种全新的技术。

translation: You may not notice that it's rendered entirely at the speed of a frame in milliseconds or one or two seconds, or at the speed of a picture.
transcript: 大家可能都没有注意到，是完全用这种毫秒级的或者是一到两秒级的一帧的这样的速度或者一个画面的速度来渲染出来的。

translation: It's the works created by GritWorld and Masaya Fukunishi.
transcript: 呃，它是来自玄机科技和福西的作品。

translation: The Director Leping Shen of the GritWorld is also here today.
transcript: 然后玄机科技的沈乐平导演也在我们的现场。

translation: He is the first director to adopt this global technology in China and even in the world.
transcript: 他是中国第一个来拥抱这个全局技术的第一个导演乃至全球。

translation: Okay, let's have a look.
transcript: 好，我们来看一下。

translation: I believe this year will witness a historic moment.
transcript: 所以这，我觉得今年会是一个历史性的时刻。

translation: As you may not know, the works that you have seen are made by the brand new technology.
transcript: 就是大家可能都不知道您看到的作品，已经是在用这种全新的技术来制作。

translation: The production cycle of one episode, for example, is shortened from two months to one or two weeks.
transcript: 而且它它能够使制作的周期，比如说从两个月一呃做一集，把它加快到一到两周就能做一集。

translation: I predict that this year will witness the innovation in this field.
transcript: 这个领域的革新，我我预测就在今年。

translation: We are working with major companies to promote this process, which, I believe, will in turn revolutionize the Hollywood production process.
transcript: 而且我们已经在和各大的这个公司一起来推动这个流程，而且我认为这个流程会反过来去革新好莱坞的制作流程。

translation: After game brings revolution to the film and television, what will happen next?
transcript: 在一呃游戏把影视革命了之后，那下一步会发生什发生什么呢？

translation: Here, it's time for us to discuss about our topic today: human-machine interaction.
transcript: 我觉得就是我们今天要讲的这个话题，人机交互。

translation: Let's watch a video first.
transcript: 大家先看一个视频。

translation: A program can also be implemented without any phone.
transcript: 就是没有手机的，一个可以落地的一个方案。

translation: As you can imagine, when there is no mobile phone, your pair of glasses is actually electronic one.
transcript: 大家可以想象，在没有手机的时候，您那个眼镜其实它是一个电子眼镜。

translation: It's unconventional and portable.
transcript: 你是不是普通的眼镜，它会在一个你戴着非常的轻便。

translation: Then you can go everywhere with it.
transcript: 然后您可以戴到任意的地方。

translation: All the screens can be cancelled through digital overlay.
transcript: 所以所有的屏幕都可以取消。

translation: At the same time, you can also obtain good experience.
transcript: 都可以以一种数字叠加的方式，而且你的体验感也非常的好。

translation: In fact, we can also further imagine.
transcript: 但是其实我我们还可以再脑洞大开一点。

translation: After the mobile phone and the screen are replaced, can further progress be made?
transcript: 就是说在手机被取代，屏幕被取代之后，能不能做得更更进一步呢？

translation: This is one of my ultimate predictions for human interaction based on data.
transcript: 就是我对人类以呃以数据这个交互的一个终极的一个一个设想。

translation: I think that we are probably surrounded by soft objects.
transcript: 就是我认为我们人很可能是被一个这个软体所包所包围了。

translation: When I took the flight from Frankfurt, I was probably wrapped in a soft object, just like the girl.
transcript: 就是我从法兰克福飞过来，很可能是我包在一个软体里面，像这个女孩一样。

translation: She is surrounded by a soft object, like a ball, which provides feelings through many sensors on it.
transcript: 她的周边是被一个像一个球一样的一个软性物体所包围，然后它上面有很多的传感器来给你感觉。

translation: It is the capsule that makes everyone feel like sitting together at the venue, in fact.
transcript: 所以大家一起坐到会场，其实是您在那个胶囊里面产生了一种感觉。

translation: When you walk on, you're like this girl, who's been walking in the same place, in the capsule.
transcript: 而且你走路的时候，就像这个女孩一样，她一直在原地走路，包在那个胶囊里。

translation: In this virtual world, she feels as if she walked forward, but she doesn't.
transcript: 但是她在这个虚拟的世界里，她在一直一直不停地往前走，她感觉她在往前走，其实她没有。

translation: When this kind of capsule is created, I believe we may change our understanding of the whole world.
transcript: 当这样的这个包围的胶囊做出来之后，我觉得我们可能会颠覆我们对整个世界的一个理解。

translation: I think this is only the first concept or one of the possible solutions for human-machine interaction.
transcript: 然后，呃，我还有一个就是说我觉得这只是第一层呢，第一层人与机器交交互的一个一个概念或者说一个可能实现的方案。

translation: The more horrible thing is that maybe the skin is fake.
transcript: 还有更恐怖的事情就是我觉得皮肤都有可能是假的。

translation: You may be a bunch of organs and objects surrounded by blood, muscles, bones, and meridians in a capsule.
transcript: 所以你可能是在一个一个一个胶囊里面被这个血液、肌肉、骨骼、经脉所包含的一个一堆的这个器官和和物体。

translation: This is more horrible.
transcript: 所以呃，这个讲起来就就比较恐怖。

translation: Possibly, it's your thought within the capsule.
transcript: 而且很有可能说，这个胶囊里面也可是可能是一个你的思想。

translation: Only your thought is inside the capsule.
transcript: 就是你只是一个想法。

translation: Other things can be passed on to you by digitization and virtual feelings.
transcript: 其他所有的东西都有可能是被数字化和这个虚拟的这个感觉传给你的。

translation: Of course, it remains to be explored.
transcript: 当然这个有待于我们去这个呃去挖掘。

translation: The aforementioned items are the scenarios that, I believe, are possible to come true in the future.
transcript: 那前面讲的是这些接下来可能实现的以及我认为，呃，有可能实现的一些场景。

translation: All of these technologies rely on the game engine to be achieved.
transcript: 但是所有的这些技术，它都会依赖于一款叫游戏引擎的东西来把它转为现实。

translation: Now, I'll showcase the game engine.
transcript: 好，我接下来给大家展示一下什么叫游戏引擎。

translation: In making a game, we'll use the tool to make a game step by step.
transcript: 就是我们在做游戏的时候，它会用这款工具来把这个游戏一步一步做出来。

translation: This process involves many underlying technologies.
transcript: 呃，很多底层的技术。

translation: The tool will help you achieve them saving the trouble to repeat.
transcript: 你都不用去重复地来实现。

translation: Therefore, this step is drawing the terrain.
transcript: 所以这个是在画一个地形。

translation: I believe our world is probably created in this manner.
transcript: 其实我觉得我们的世界很可能是这样被创造出来的。

translation: Firstly, we draw the terrain.
transcript: 好，先画地形。

translation: Then, let's draw the lake and the vegetation next to it.
transcript: 再画一个湖泊，然后旁边再刷一下这个植被。

translation: Next, let's add some trees.
transcript: 之后再加一些树木。

translation: The objects inside can be modified, copied and pasted at will.
transcript: 那里面的物体是都可以任意地修改，也可以任意地复制、粘贴。

translation: The lights can be adjusted in real time at any time for 24 hours.
transcript: 灯光24小时都可以随时地实时地调节。

translation: The color of the lights and others can also be adjusted.
transcript: 还有灯光的颜色等等都可以都可以调。

translation: If this tool can be operated easily on your mobile phone, your friends, your spouse and you can create the scene and easily experience everything in the scene.Have you ever thought about that?
transcript: 呃，大家有没有想过，如果这款工具能够在你的手机上面很方便地实现，以及你能够跟你的朋友在旁边或者跟你的爱人一起创建这么一个场景，然后您可以很快就进入这个场景来进行体验的时候？

translation: How amazing it is, isn't it?
transcript: 这种对你带来的震撼感是多么的强烈，是吧？

translation: It's not enough to have a game engine.
transcript: 那有了游戏引擎其实这还是不够的。

translation: Like the scenes I just mentioned, they can't run on the device because they're too memory-consuming.
transcript: 像我刚才说的这些场景，它无法运行在设备上，因为它太重度。

translation: In our process of transforming films, digits, cities and others, we will find any minor modification will lead to our work of maintenance for weeks and months.
transcript: 而且在我们对用游戏引擎改造影视，改造这个数字这个城市等等这个过程当中，我们会发现，任何的一个小小的修改，它都会造成我们几个星期以及几个月的这个维护。

translation: Also, we need to code.
transcript: 还有代码的工作量。

translation: We even evaluated all the game engines to prove whether the existing open source engine can be used for production to meet the needs of the next generation for human-machine interaction.
transcript: 我们甚至还评估了所有的游戏引擎，说能不能拿一个现有的开源的引擎来进行一个制作，然后就能满足下一代人机交互的需求呢？

translation: Our conclusion is that it is better to rewrite.
transcript: 我们的结论是还不如重新写。

translation: As a lot of things have been fully solidified, we are unable to implant new algorithms in the existing ones.
transcript: 因为很多东西它已经完全固化，来了很多新的算法之后，我们也没没法植入。

translation: There are more than 20 people in our company in Germany for developing the next generation of digital engine.
transcript: 呃，所以我们公司就是德国有20多个人，就在开发下一代的这个数字数字引擎。

translation: By the end of this year, there'll be a test version.
transcript: 它大概会在今年的年底就会有一个这个测试的版本。

translation: We hope that this engine will be put into production and used next year.
transcript: 那我们希望明年这个引擎就能投入生产和使用。

translation: We call it GRITGENE, because we just want it to be available to everyone so that it can change the way of human digital interaction as a whole just like the gene transformation.
transcript: 我们把它叫GRITGENE，因为我们希望它能够就是能够每一个人都能够使用，像基因一样来改造我们整个的人类的数字交互的方式。

translation: The aforementioned are display technologies, i.e., you create the virtual things.
transcript: 好，除了我们刚才说的这个这些都是一些显示的技术，就是你把虚拟的东西创造出来。

translation: If we want to revolutionize the human-machine interaction, we still need a very core technology, "digital reconstruction technology".
transcript: 那我们如果要革命这个人机交互，它还需要一个非常核心的东西叫“数字重建技术”。

translation: For example, if I want to turn the entire auditorium into a vast ocean, then in addition to this display technology, I have to check the height of the ground and the size of the entire theater.
transcript: 举个举个例子来说，我如果说我想把整个的观众席变成一个汪洋大海，那我除了这个显示技术之外，我还要检测这个地面的高度，还有整个剧场它的大小的尺寸。

translation: Therefore, machine vision technology is needed.
transcript: 那这个就要靠计算机视觉技术。

translation: I need to take some photos.
transcript: 就是说我会拍一些照片。

translation: In a better situation, with the scanning of the mobile phone, all the dimensions about the size can be obtained.
transcript: 呃，比较好的情况是我用手机扫一圈，那下面的这个所有的所有的这个尺寸我就出来了。

translation: Or, a little movement of my device during my speech can help detect the size.
transcript: 或者说我的设备在我这样子演讲过程中的少许的移动，我的下面的尺寸就全部被检测出来了。

translation: If I pull an ocean in, the ocean emerges in front of me.
transcript: 那我只要拉一个海进去，我的前面就是一个汪洋大海。

translation: Therefore, digital reconstruction technology is the second core technology.
transcript: 所以说数字重建技术是整个里面第二大的一个核心的技术。

translation: Let's take a look at a demo of the digital city that we have created with our latest mass production technology.
transcript: 那我们来看一下我们用我们的这种呃最新的量产的大规模的技术来制作数字城市的一个demo。

translation: This is a hundred-square-kilometer area in Dongguan.
transcript: 这是在东莞的一百平方公里。

translation: We have reconstructed a digital chassis with a one-to-one ratio.
transcript: 我们的一个一比一的一个数字重建的一个数字底盘。

translation: As far as I know, this is the first project to carry out the entire restoration on this scale.
transcript: 这个据我所知是一个，第一个这种大规模的能把整个的还原的一个呃一个一个项目。

translation: Lakes, roads, vehicles, and entire houses are all converted to digital models with a one-to-one ratio.
transcript: 然后它是把湖泊、道路、车辆、整个的房屋都是按一比一的比例还原成数字的模式。

translation: You can arbitrarily modify models, play the "Need for Speed" game inside, or have dinner with your family in a building.
transcript: 可以你可以进行任意地修改，也可以在里面这个进行极品飞车，也可以在里面跟你的家人找某栋楼在里面晚餐。

translation: This project was feasible before, but it didn't reach mass production.
transcript: 那以前这个是可以做的，但是还没达到大规模的量产。

translation: As the cost is acceptable, we meet the challenge and launch the project.
transcript: 成本可以接受，所以我们迎接了我们去找到了这个挑战而且把它落地下来。

translation: This is a demonstration of the central city of Hangzhou, which is also restored based on one-to-one ratio.
transcript: 呃这是杭州的中心城区的一个展示，也是一比一的还原。

translation: This is Huancheng East Road.
transcript: 这是环城东路。

translation: All the vehicles on the road are digital ones installed with AI functions, so they will automatically stop when they detect the vehicles in front.
transcript: 里面的汽车全是数字的，它也是带人工智能的，它看到前面的车它就会自动地停。

translation: Then you can implant any information into it, like microscopic-displayed information, advertising, e-commerce and e-government information.
transcript: 然后您可以往里面植入任何的信息，像显微的显示的信息，还有广告的信息，还有以后的电商等等，还有政府的这个智慧的管理。

translation: Traffic lights can also be automatically optimized and scheduled.
transcript: 交通交通信号灯的这个自动的优化的调配都可以。

translation: This is a project we have worked with Alibaba ET City Brain.
transcript: 这是我们跟阿里巴巴ET城市大脑合作的一个项目。

translation: In this mass production process, we have encountered many technical problems, which we have solved directly.
transcript: 好，在这个量产过程中呢，我们会遇到很多的技术，那么我们碰到的技术难题，我们直接把它解决。

translation: This is a good example.
transcript: 像这是一个很好的一个例子。

translation: After you take a few photos, we have tools that help build the model of the photos directly.
transcript: 我们你拍了几幅照片之后，我们会有工具让你直接把它的模型很傻瓜地就把它建出来。

translation: In the future, this tool will deliver it to our mobile phones.
transcript: 而以后这种工具会把它推到我们的手机端。

translation: You can see that the time has been shortened from days or one day to a few minutes.
transcript: 大家可以看到，大概以前要花几天时间或者是一天时间的事情，我们几分钟就可以把它做好。

translation: This is a picture from Microsoft Research Institute in Asia.
transcript: 这是微软亚洲研究院另外一个从二维到。

translation: By using the technology, 3D model can be established based on the 2D model of the picture.
transcript: 就是一张图片你就可以把它的三维的模型就可以跳出来。

translation: For instance, if there is a photo of a shoe, the e-commerce company can make it directly by the technology.
transcript: 像这个鞋子，所以电商如果有一张照片。

translation: Then, the color can be changed and rotation can  be also achieved.
transcript: 它就“pia”就可以把这个做出来之后改颜色、旋转都可以完成。

translation: As everyone can see, every single breakthrough in technology is very impressive.
transcript: 所以，大家看到每一个单点的技术的突破都很牛逼。

translation: However, it's hard to integrate these technologies to reach this goal.
transcript: 但是怎么把这些技术融合起来，使得我们能够往这个方向推，是一个非常难的一个东西。

translation: Therefore, we hope that our company can make its due contribution to the wave of human-machine interaction.
transcript: 呃，所以我们希望，在这个人机交互的这个大潮里面，我们能做出我们公司所应有的贡献。

translation: In my opinion, our ultimate entertainment and life can hardly be separated from each other.
transcript: 所以，我的个人理解是说，我们终极的娱乐和生活它是不怎么分离的。

translation: Someone asked me, "Why don't you make a game engine?"
transcript: 有人问我说，哎吴博士，为什么不做个游戏引擎？

translation: I told him, "Game and life are completely connected, so it's hard to distinguish game from life."
transcript: 我说游戏以后就是和生活是完全无缝地对接的，已经分不出来游戏和生活的区别。

translation: As we have just seen, the constant expansion of the scale and mass production of the digital earth, the promotion of the government and the scanning abilities of the smart devices, the integration and co-existence of the real world and virtual digital world emerge.
transcript: 然后当这种我们刚才看到的数字地球它不断地规模，不断地量产，又有政府的推动，又有大家智能设备的扫描，它就会产生刚才一样一个现实世界和一个虚拟数字世界它的一个一个融合和平行。

translation: The digital world can be superimposed onto the real world.
transcript: 而且这个数字世界它可以叠加在我们的现实世界里面。

translation: You can choose to live in the real world, or the virtual world.
transcript: 你可以选择活在现实世界，也可以选择活在这个虚拟的呃，虚拟的世界里。

translation: Then, it is very likely that we will have a digital identity and coexist with the AI.
transcript: 然后很有可能我们有一个数字身份的概念，我们和AI会共存。

translation: The digital identity indicates the location in which you are and the world which you live in.
transcript: 然后这个数字身份证上面会标明呃，你是在哪你是在哪边，生活在哪个世界里。

translation: Finally, I would like to share with you what is the digital world and the human-machine interaction I expect.
transcript: 然后最后我讲一下，我所期待的这个数字世界和和人机交互。

translation: Let's imagine, everyone.
transcript: 大家可以想象一个场景。

translation: For example, my daughter, she is about 20 years old after more than ten years.
transcript: 嗯，比如说我的女儿，到这个十几年之后她已经大概20岁。

translation: She is also here today.
transcript: 她也在现场。

translation: She will go out from the school building and wait for an unmanned bus.
transcript: 然后她从一个从一个大楼里面，她教学楼走下来的时候，她就去等一辆无人驾驶的公交车。

translation: As it is too far away, this bus will take about ten minutes to arrive.
transcript: 然后这辆公交车呢，呃因为离得太远了，大概有十分钟到。

translation: She first looks at the bus stop boards.
transcript: 呃，她先看了一下这个公交车牌前面全。

translation: In fact, the bus stop boards are no longer needed, because they are all replaced by projection of glasses.
transcript: 其实公交车牌已经都不需要了，因为全部被呃眼镜的这种投影所所替代。

translation: As she has to wait for ten minutes, she takes a look at the direction of the bus.
transcript: 她看到还有十分钟，所以她就看了一眼这个公交车的方向。

translation: She will see a digital bus, and the bus is exactly like the actual one.
transcript: 她就看到公交车，她就可以看到一个数字的公交车，而且这个公交车跟它实际的公交车运行是完全很像。

translation: There are also people sitting inside.
transcript: 而里面也坐着人。

translation: Of course, these people are digital, so they are similar to the real human, although they are not 100% same to the real human.
transcript: 这些人是数字化的当然也很像，不是百分之百的一样。

translation: Therefore, when she looks across, she can see the expressions and behaviors of these people, and the arrival time and the guideboard number of the bus.
transcript: 所以她这样一眼看过去，能看到这些人的表情，这些人在干什么，以及这辆车它是什么时候到，以及它的这个路牌的这个号码。

translation: As it takes time for the bus to arrive, she can work with the classmates or have some entertainment.
transcript: 所以她一看这个公交车还有这么久来，那我就跟我的同学先工作一会儿或者是娱乐一会儿。

translation: Then she starts to contact her classmates.
transcript: 所以她去联系了她的同学。

translation: She doesn't need mobile phone, which is replaced by a device.
transcript: 她没有手机了，是一款设备。

translation: She talks to her classmates, "Today, the teacher gives an assignment, so let's discuss about it."
transcript: 她同学她说，同学，呃我们今天老师布置了一个作业，那我们把作业讨论一下。

translation: Then, she zooms in the image of the classmate.
transcript: 然后她把同学拉过来。

translation: She can clearly see that her classmate is in front of her.
transcript: 她同学就在她的眼前，她看得非常的清楚。

translation: Of course, the image is not 100% identical to the real human, because high similarity is too costly.
transcript: 当然不是百分之百跟她一致啊，因为东西太像了成本就太高。

translation: I think, firstly, this image will not be highly similar to the real one.
transcript: 我认为第一步它不会做得太像。

translation: It will just provide some physical feelings.
transcript: 你能有你的感觉就好了。

translation: Just as before, she draws a screen.
transcript: 所以她跟她讨论了老师的方案，画个屏幕，是吧跟刚才一样。

translation: Then, she discusses about the plan on the screen.
transcript: 就把这个方案在上面讨论完了。

translation: After the discussion, the bus arrives.
transcript: 讨论完了之后呢，呃，公交车来了。

translation: She gets on the bus.
transcript: 于是她就走了。

translation: I think this experience is very likely to come into birth soon.
transcript: 所以像这种的体验我认为是很有可能很快就会发生的。

translation: Of course, it requires our efforts.
transcript: 当然需要我们的努力。

translation: I will finally talk about my expectations.
transcript: 然后我最后再说一下我自己的一个期待。

translation: I have two constant needs for the digital world.
transcript: 我我自己有两个对于这个数字世界有两个刚性的需求。

translation: Firstly, I need to take business trips from Germany to Shanghai and then to Guangzhou to have international conferences with different teams.
transcript: 第一我这个从德国再又到上海又到广州跑来跑去的，我要和各个团队开这种跨国的会议。

translation: I hope that there is a device that allows me to communicate with my teams just as if they sat next to me.
transcript: 我希望有一款设备能够让我跟我的这个我的团队能够很好的交流，就是他像坐在我旁边一样。

translation: I can have the conferences, deal with PPT, and observe my teammates' expressions and tones.
transcript: 我跟他们开会，画PPT，以及我观察他们的表情，他们说话的语气。

translation: This is my first hope.
transcript: 我都希望能很好地看到，这是这是第一个。

translation: Secondly, my parents and my sister passed away many years ago.
transcript: 呃，第二个，我的父母还有我的姐姐很早去世了。

translation: I have never seen my grandfather.
transcript: 我的爷爷我都没见到过。

translation: I hope there is a device, which makes it easy for me to create my loved ones based on photos so that I can communicate with them.
transcript: 我很想说有一款这样的设备，让我很方便地根据照片创建出我已去的亲人，然后我能跟他们进行一个交流。

translation: I very much hope that our work, passions, capital and commercial projects can propel these technologies.
transcript: 所以嗯我非常希望，呃，经过我们这种落地的一些工作，然后还有一些这个激情的一些推动，资本的推动以及商业落地项目来反推这些技术。

translation: In this way, the human-machine interaction can truly be improved in a revolutionary manner.
transcript: 让我们人与机器的交互有一个呃真正的革命性的提升。

translation: That's the end of my speech today.
transcript: 好，这是我今天的演讲。

translation: Thank you!
transcript: 谢谢大家！
